data.eml:eml: A new species of Terellia (Diptera: Tephritidae) from Iran with a key to the species of the tarbinskiorum group

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Namin, Saeed Mohamadzade, Nozari, Jamasb, Najarpoor, Arezoo (2011): A new species of Terellia (Diptera: Tephritidae) from Iran with a key to the species of the tarbinskiorum group. Zootaxa 2750: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.201463
